question: Which organisation told the India growth will be 7.7 in 2018 - 2019?
explanation: International Monetary Fund(IMF) told India's growth is expected to rebound to 7.2 per cent in the 2017-18 fiscal and 7.7 per cent in 2018-19 after disruptions caused by demonetisation. They also report the investment recovery is expected to remain modest and uneven across sectors as deleveraging takes place and industrial capacity utilisation picks up.
